Title: Draconic Diplomacy
Description:
I suspect Vyranoth might also be interested in recruiting new dragons to our cause... but she'll need a little convincing. 

I just so happen to be very good at convincing. 

I'll speak with Vyranoth, and we'll meet you in Valdrakken once she's decided to join us.
ObjectivesText: Talk to Prince Mordenaku at the Petitioners Concourse in Valdrakken.
